title: Provider bloatware pre-installation
content:
Great! Now Google automatically installs provider bloatware on factory unlocked devices! Case in point: I have a Pixel 3 which I originally bought from the Google Store unlocked. The past months, I was running the Q beta but decided to opt out a few days ago. Naturally, my phone received the downgrade and I had to set it up again - no big deal for me. The thing that really bothered me: after I finished the setup, I found the "My T-Mobile" app as well as the "T-Mobile Phone Unlock Status" pre-installed.

Here is the thing: I am not even a T-Mobile customer!

If I was remotely interested in any provider bloat, I can download that crap myself! Not cool!

(Yeah, I know, Google probably will never read this.)
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
